text: The Audience is a play by the British playwright and screenwriter Peter Morgan.Michael Billington, "The Audience â€“ review" The Guardian (London), 5 March 2013 The play is about the weekly meetings, called audiences, between Queen Elizabeth II and her prime ministers. It premiered in the West End in 2013. A Broadway version opened in 2015. A television version of the play soon became a series on Netflix known as The Crown. ==References== Category:Elizabeth II
title: The Audience (2013 play)
